last_episode_to_air.name: Triumphant Warriors
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lady Kayura and the warlords fight alongside the heroes to stop Talpa before he destroys the world.

name: Ronin Warriors
original_name: 鎧伝サムライトルーパー
overview: Five young men with mystical armor fight to save the mortal from the evil Talpa.

episodes.name: Shadowland
episodes.overview: As dark clouds portend the coming of an invasion force, five warriors arrive to battle the threat.

episodes.name: Glory for Anubis
episodes.overview: Talpa dispatches his warlord Anubis to find Mia as a way of drawing out the warriors.

episodes.name: Secret of Wildfire
episodes.overview: With the warriors scattered across the world, Mia and Ully go in search of Ryo.

episodes.name: The Search Begins
episodes.overview: Ryo, Mia and Ully seek help from Mia's grandfather, who suspiciously refuses to help them.

episodes.name: Halo's Prison
episodes.overview: Mia uses a line from her grandfather's poem to find Sage, but Sekhmet tracks them down.

episodes.name: The Counter Attack
episodes.overview: The gang heads to the Sea of Toyama to find Cye, where Ryo must brave a whirlpool to rescue him.

episodes.name: Splitting the Stone
episodes.overview: Mia and Sage look for Kento and come up against harsh weather, wild wolves, and a determined Cale.

episodes.name: Friend or Foe
episodes.overview: Ryo and Cye set out to rescue Rowen from Dais, whose illusions turn the warriors against each other.

episodes.name: Wildfire in the Sky
episodes.overview: The team splits up to learn what Talpa has planned for Rowen, who is lost somewhere in space.

episodes.name: In the Sea of the Sky
episodes.overview: Ryo attempts to break free of the dark matrix while his allies on the ground battle Talpa.

episodes.name: Assault on the Dynasty
episodes.overview: Dais lures the heroes into a trap within the castle gates and separates them from their armor.

episodes.name: Shallow Darkness
episodes.overview: As the heroes approach Talpa's castle, the enemy attacks and succeeds in splitting up the team.

episodes.name: Fate of the Ronin Armor
episodes.overview: Talpa enacts a plan to turn the heroes to evil based on his knowledge of their armors' dark origins.

episodes.name: Armor of Life
episodes.overview: Anubis fights the heroes at an amusement park and a fearful Kento tries to fight without his armor.

episodes.name: The Ancient's Battle
episodes.overview: The Ancient One reveals the nature of the mystical armors; Anubis rethinks his loyalty to Talpa.

episodes.name: Raid on Talpa's Castle
episodes.overview: The heroes reach Talpa's castle and face the combined might of Talpa's dark forces.

episodes.name: The Legend of the Armor
episodes.overview: Talpa dons his warlords' armors to directly attack the heroes and steal their armors for himself.

episodes.name: Talpa's Triumph
episodes.overview: Ryo must find a way to defeat Talpa without destroying his captured friends.

episodes.name: Wildfire's Fight Against Fate
episodes.overview: The Ancient One helps Ryo resist Talpa's attempt to absorb him into his armor.

episodes.name: Ronin vs. Saranbo
episodes.overview: A new threat named Saranbo arrives to claim the Inferno Armor for himself.

episodes.name: Ryo's Mega Armor
episodes.overview: A regretful Ryo abandons the team over Mia's objections to face Saranbo alone.

episodes.name: Saber Stryke's Deadly Challenge
episodes.overview: Lord Saber Stryke and his tiger attack the heroes over possession of powerful swords.

episodes.name: White Blaze's Sacrifice
episodes.overview: With the heroes in need of the Soul Swords, White Blaze risks his life to steal them.

episodes.name: Sun Devil: Ambassador of Evil
episodes.overview: On the way to investigate a volcano, the heroes encounter a foe who wants to test their strength.

episodes.name: Torrent's Evil Twin
episodes.overview: Sekhmet creates an evil duplicate of Cye to subdue the real one.

episodes.name: The Armor Must Be Destroyed
episodes.overview: Sage fights a battle of wills when Cale attempts to convince him he is capable of great evil.

episodes.name: Sand Blasted
episodes.overview: Kento must learn to rely on more than his brute strength to win fights.

episodes.name: Lady Kayura and the Dark Realm
episodes.overview: Rowen and Ryo encounter Lady Kayura and learn Talpa's forces have captured their friends.

episodes.name: Anubis Is Reborn
episodes.overview: Ryo and Rowen encounter a familiar face who pledges to help them.

episodes.name: Talpa Turns the Tide
episodes.overview: Anubis attempts to gain Mia and Ully's trust and explains his past; Talpa creates a new weapon.

episodes.name: Legend of the White Armor
episodes.overview: Dala attacks Ryo and Rowen with Talpa's new sword, which allows him to use their friends' powers.

episodes.name: Strategies of the Nether World
episodes.overview: The villains attempt to take control of Ryo's armor, unwittingly revealing another aspect of it.

episodes.name: In Search of Secret Treasures
episodes.overview: Anubis and Mia come across something important in Mia's grandfather's research.

episodes.name: Strata's Defiant Stand
episodes.overview: Mia and Anubis try to puzzle out how to use the Jewel of Life to defeat Anubis.

episodes.name: The Warriors Return
episodes.overview: Rowan sacrifices himself to help Ryo and the others fend off Lady Kayura.

episodes.name: Cheap Tricks
episodes.overview: Sage and Rowen defend Mia and Ully, who possess the Jewel of Life, from Talpa's minions.

episodes.name: Anubis' Armor Revived
episodes.overview: The heroes take a much-needed rest to prepare for the final showdown with Talpa.

episodes.name: Lady Evil Sees the Light
episodes.overview: Anubis battles a possessed Lady Kayura in the hopes of freeing her from the bonds of evil.

episodes.name: Triumphant Warriors
episodes.overview: Lady Kayura and the warlords fight alongside the heroes to stop Talpa before he destroys the world.
